# 报告说明

```{r contexts-building, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
as_tibble(descriptions$context) %>%
  mutate(md = render_title_content(title, content, hlevel = 2)) %>%
  pull(md) %>%
  paste(collapse = "\n\n") %>%
  cat()
```

## 学生参加测评的情况

* 测评学校：`r school_name`
* 测评时间：`r format(test_date, "%Y年%b")`
* 实测人数：`r n_distinct(ability_scores_school$userId)`人
